name: Pixi Racer
description:
Overview:

A small multiplayer game where you can race your friends. Control your pixel-art character as you dash through an obstacle course to claim first place! Or test yourself with a friend, in split screen versus mode!

Goal:

PIXI RACER is a multiplayer-platformer game. The goal of the game is to reach the endpoint of the level before your competing challenger overcoming every barrier throughout the game.


Controls:

Movement: 

W - Jump

A- Left

D- Right

2x W - Double Jump

ARJUN KAPOOR  - Programmer

ARNAV SANGHAVI - Progammer

GURPREET SINGH OBHAN - Game Design

MAAHI LIKHARI - Game Design

VITTAL GUNJA - UI Design
